title: Protect your eyes
content: Don't squint at the dense text on web pages; it can make your eyes tired and dry. For the sake of your eyes, zoom in for a more comfortable view.

title: Zoom Smooth
content: You can smoothly zoom in on any area of a webpage. For this, we've implemented dynamic zoom effects that smoothly magnify the selected area within 400 milliseconds.

title: No touchpad
content: Close your Mac; you don't need a touchpad. You can easily achieve SmartZoom with just a mouse.

title: Maintains layout
content: Maintains the original page layout without changing the positions of elements, making browsing more natural.
